channel.title: Comments on: Listening to Sweet Talk versus Resilience Training.
channel.description: Strategies to recover from stress quickly

item.title: By: Jerry Sheridan
item.dc:creator: Jerry Sheridan
item.description:
Thanks so much for your comments. I wish we had many more people who actually acquaint themselves with what it takes to improve resilience. As you point out, it requires practicing resilience skills that have been carefully selected to improve the way we function in our world.
JS
item.content:encoded:
Thanks so much for your comments. I wish we had many more people who actually acquaint themselves with what it takes to improve resilience. As you point out, it requires practicing resilience skills that have been carefully selected to improve the way we function in our world.

JS

item.title: By: Kate Levens
item.dc:creator: Kate Levens
item.description: Excellent article. Sweet Talk is not helpful. Breathing, exercise, staying in the moment these are helpful. Thank you for your efforts and help!
item.content:encoded: Excellent article. Sweet Talk is not helpful. Breathing, exercise, staying in the moment these are helpful. Thank you for your efforts and help!
